What do you want?
The mandatory character of schooling is rarely analyzed in the multitude of works dedicated to the study of the various ways to develop within children the desire to learn.
zh: 在众多致力于研究如何在儿童内心培养学习欲望的著作中，很少分析学校教育的强制性特征。

en: I have a bone to pick with you.
Do you need me to give you some money?
zh: 你需要我给你一些钱吗？

en: Paris is the most beautiful city in the world.
zh: 巴黎是世界上最美丽的城市。

en: Hey, I may have no money, but I still have my pride.
zh: 嘿，我可能没钱，但我还有我的尊严。

en: I have a dream.
This is my friend Rachel. We went to high school together.
zh: 这是我的朋友瑞秋。我们一起上的高中。

en: The cost of life increased drastically.
All that which is invented, is true.
zh: 凡是虚构的，都是真实的。

en: To be surprised, to wonder, is to begin to understand.
zh: 感到惊讶，感到疑惑，是理解的开始。

en: But the universe is infinite.
To be perfect she lacked just one defect.
zh: 要达到完美，她只差一个缺点。

en: And yet, the contrary is always true as well.
zh: 然而，相反的情况也总是成立的。

en: We don't see things as they are, but as we are.
zh: 我们看到的不是事物本来的样子，而是我们自己的样子。

en: The world is a den of crazies.
You found me where no one else was looking.
zh: 你在别人找不到我的地方找到了我。

en: You're by my side; everything's fine now.
zh: 你在我身边，现在一切都好。

en: What do you mean you don't know?!
zh: 你说你不知道是什么意思？！

en: You look stupid.
I think I'm gonna go to sleep.
My name is Jack.
I like it very much.
We're meeting up tomorrow?
How do you say that in Italian?
zh: 这个用意大利语怎么说？

en: I have to go shopping. I'll be back in an hour.
zh: 我要去购物。我一个小时后回来。

en: Is it far from here?
These things aren't mine!
Thanks, that's all.
Would you like to dance with me?
Italy is a very beautiful country.
zh: 意大利是一个非常美丽的国家。

en: It's not my fault!
I'd like to stay for one night.
Could you dial for me? The telephone is too high.
zh: 你能帮我拨号吗？电话太高了。

en: Is there a youth hostel near here?
Where are the showers?
Open your mouth!
Is it bad?
I have lost my wallet.
Love is never wasted.
Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
zh: 人生就是当你忙着做其他计划时发生在你身上的事。

en: Not wanting is the same as having.
He's very sexy.
"Pass me the salt, please." "Here you are."
There are too many things to do!
Come on, play with me, I'm so bored!
zh: 来嘛，和我玩，我太无聊了！

en: Don't you even think of eating my chocolate!
Stop asking me for a drink! Go get it yourself.
zh: 别再问我要饮料了！自己去拿。

en: Thanks to you I've lost my appetite.
zh: 多亏了你，我都没胃口了。

en: I really need to hit somebody.
Who doesn't know this problem?!
It has been so long since I last went to Disneyland with my family.
zh: 上次和家人一起去迪士尼乐园已经很久了。

en: My parents keep arguing about stupid things. It's so annoying!
zh: 我父母总是为愚蠢的事情争吵。真烦人！

en: If you don't want to put on sunscreen, that's your problem. Just don't come complaining to me when you get a sunburn.
zh: 如果你不想涂防晒霜，那是你的问题。晒伤了别来找我抱怨。

en: My friends always say I'm too calm, but my family always says I'm too annoying.
zh: 我的朋友总是说我太冷静了，但我的家人总是说我太烦人了。

en: I hate those spiders. They're always there to freak me out when I'm cleaning.
zh: 我讨厌那些蜘蛛。我打扫卫生的时候，它们总是在那里吓唬我。

en: So annoying... Now I get a headache whenever I use the computer!
zh: 真烦人……现在我一用电脑就头疼！

en: It's so hot that you could cook an egg on the hood of a car.
zh: 太热了，你都可以在汽车引擎盖上煎鸡蛋了。

en: It is very hot today.
Nobody came.
Better to be hated for who you are than loved for who you're not.
zh: 宁愿因为真实的自己而被讨厌，也不要因为虚假的自己而被爱。

en: It's lonely in the saddle since the horse died.
zh: 马死了，独自在马鞍上感觉很孤独。

en: My eyes are an ocean in which my dreams are reflected.
zh: 我的眼睛是一片海洋，我的梦想在其中倒映。

en: Look at me when I talk to you!
zh: 我跟你说话的时候看着我！

en: What would the world be without women?
zh: 如果没有女人，世界会变成什么样？

en: What if you gave a speech and nobody came?
zh: 如果你发表演讲，却没有人来，会怎么样？

en: I don't know what to say to make you feel better.
zh: 我不知道该说什么才能让你感觉好一点。

en: This is not my type.
I was trying to kill time.
How did you come up with this crazy idea?
zh: 你是怎么想到这个疯狂主意的？

en: I'm tired.
Who wants some hot chocolate?
Speak more slowly, please!
When do we arrive?
The check, please.
And what are we going to do?
I have a headache.
Where can one make a phone call?
I must admit that I snore.
Tonight we're going to church.
How are you? Did you have a good trip?
I don't feel well.
Call the police!
It's too expensive!
She's faking sleep. That's why she's not snoring.
zh: 她在装睡。所以她才不打鼾。

en: My shoes are too small. I need new ones.
zh: 我的鞋太小了，我需要新的。

en: We're getting out of here. The cops are coming.
zh: 我们得离开这里，警察来了。

en: Merry Christmas!
It would be so cool if I could speak ten languages!
zh: 如果我会说十种语言，那就太酷了！

en: "If you're tired, why don't you go to sleep?" "Because if I go to sleep now I will wake up too early."
zh: “如果你累了，为什么不去睡觉呢？” “因为如果我现在睡觉，我会醒得太早。”

en: You should have listened to me.
It's a complete mess, and it's getting on my nerves.
zh: 这完全是一团糟，真让我心烦。

en: When the body is touched, receptors in the skin send messages to the brain causing the release of chemicals such as endorphins.
zh: 当身体被触摸时，皮肤中的感受器会向大脑发送信息，导致内啡肽等化学物质的释放。

en: One hundred and fifty thousand couples are expected to get married in Shanghai in 2006.
zh: 预计2006年上海将有15万对新人结婚。

en: Half a million children still face malnutrition in Niger.
zh: 尼日尔仍有50万儿童面临营养不良。

en: Bicycles are tools for urban sustainability.
zh: 自行车是城市可持续发展的工具。

en: The French government has launched an online game that challenges taxpayers to balance the national budget.
zh: 法国政府推出了一款在线游戏，挑战纳税人平衡国家预算。

en: He would be glad to hear that.
zh: 他会很高兴听到这个消息的。

en: What do you believe is true even though you cannot prove it?
zh: 你相信什么是真的，即使你无法证明它？

en: Computers make people stupid.
Don't ask what they think. Ask what they do.
zh: 不要问他们怎么想，问他们怎么做。

en: When you're trying to prove something, it helps to know it's true.
zh: 当你试图证明某件事时，知道它是真的会有帮助。

en: What changes the world is communication, not information.
zh: 改变世界的是沟通，而不是信息。

en: Most scientific breakthroughs are nothing else than the discovery of the obvious.
zh: 大多数科学突破只不过是发现显而易见的事实。

en: If you don't understand something, it's because you aren't aware of its context.
zh: 如果你不理解某件事，那是因为你没有意识到它的背景。

en: The past can only be known, not changed. The future can only be changed, not known.
zh: 过去只能被了解，不能被改变。未来只能被改变，不能被了解。

en: The key question is not what can I gain but what do I have to lose.
zh: 关键问题不是我能得到什么，而是我必须失去什么。

en: Anything that can be misunderstood will be.
zh: 任何可能被误解的事都会被误解。

en: Why is life so full of suffering?
zh: 为什么生活充满了苦难？

en: Despite the importance of sleep, its purpose is a mystery.
zh: 尽管睡眠很重要，但它的目的仍然是个谜。

en: Passion creates suffering.
The train from Geneva will arrive at the station.
zh: 从日内瓦开来的火车即将到达车站。

en: I would like to give him a present for his birthday.
zh: 我想送他一份生日礼物。

en: I'm starving!
Do you have friends in Antigua?
A cubic meter corresponds to 1000 liters.
I have so much work that I will stay for one more hour.
zh: 我有很多工作，所以我会再待一个小时。

en: I am married and have two children.
He plays the piano very well.
I see it rarely.
I'd like to study in Paris.
You don't know who I am.
Why don't you eat vegetables?
Why do people go to the movies?
I'm undressing.
The car crashed into the wall.
In a dictionary like this one there should be at least two sentences with "fridge".
zh: 像这样的字典里，应该至少有两句带有“冰箱”的句子。

en: The wind calmed down.
Give me time to give you everything I have!
zh: 给我时间，我会把我拥有的一切都给你！

en: A democrat is a free citizen who yields to the will of the majority.
zh: 民主人士是服从多数人意志的自由公民。

en: Where there's a will, there's a way.
Who searches, finds.
Rome wasn't built in a day.
Silence gives consent.
"Have you finished?" "On the contrary, I have not even begun yet."
zh: “你完成了吗？”“恰恰相反，我甚至还没有开始。”

en: "Good morning", said Tom with a smile.
Why does one say "Good day" when the day is not good?
zh: 为什么在日子不好的时候还要说“今天好”呢？

en: Wine is poetry filled in bottles.
zh: 葡萄酒是装在瓶子里的诗歌。

en: That was the best day of my life.
zh: 那是我一生中最美好的一天。

en: I don't understand German.
I made my decision.
I give you my word.
We have a Pope.
There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.
zh: 世界上有10种人：懂二进制的和不懂二进制的。

en: Don't worry, be happy!
I find foreign languages very interesting.
I don't like learning irregular verbs.
zh: 我不喜欢学习不规则动词。

en: Take a book and read it.
You make me dream.
I'm beside myself with joy.
The vacation is over now.
I'm afraid to fall.
That's the absolute truth.
It's cold.
I'm thirsty.
When I ask people what they regret most about high school, they nearly all say the same thing: that they wasted so much time.
zh: 当我问人们他们对高中生活最后悔的事情是什么时，他们几乎都说同一件事：他们浪费了太多时间。

en: When you can't do what you want, you do what you can.
zh: 当你想做的做不了时，就做你能做的。

en: Give him an inch and he'll take a yard.
You did this intentionally!
You didn't tell him anything?
You're my type.
You're irresistible.
Could you call again later, please?
Who am I talking with?
Smile now, cry later!
At the age of six he had learned to use the typewriter and told the teacher that he did not need to learn to write by hand.
zh: 他六岁的时候就学会了使用打字机，并告诉老师他不需要学习手写。

en: Life is beautiful.
He doesn't want you to tell him about your sex life.
zh: 他不想你告诉他你的性生活。

en: Have you ever eaten a banana pie?
Why would you marry a woman if you like men?
zh: 如果你喜欢男人，为什么要娶女人呢？

en: Are you for or against abortions?
What made you change your mind?
zh: 是什么让你改变了主意？

en: It's a pity that you can't buy miracles like you would buy potatoes.
zh: 可惜你不能像买土豆一样买到奇迹。

en: I love lasagna.
This baby penguin is too cute!
I'm at the hospital. I got struck by lightning.
zh: 我在医院。我被闪电击中了。

en: What is your greatest source of inspiration?
zh: 你最大的灵感来源是什么？

en: You don't marry someone you can live with — you marry the person whom you cannot live without.
zh: 你不是和一个可以一起生活的人结婚，而是和一个你不能没有的人结婚。

en: In theory, there is no difference between theory and practice. But, in practice, there is.
zh: 理论上，理论和实践没有区别。 但是，在实践中，存在差异。

en: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
zh: 不要赖在床上，除非你能在床上赚钱。

en: Anything that is too stupid to be spoken is sung.
zh: 任何蠢到不能说出口的东西都会被唱出来。

en: It requires wisdom to understand wisdom: the music is nothing if the audience is deaf.
zh: 理解智慧需要智慧：如果听众是聋子，音乐就毫无意义。

en: I was rereading the letters you sent to me.
zh: 我正在重读你寄给我的信。

en: I don't want to go to school.
It's over between us. Give me back my ring!
zh: 我们之间结束了。把我的戒指还给我！

en: It is raining.
I was planning on going to the beach today, but then it started to rain.
zh: 我本来计划今天去海滩的，结果开始下雨了。

en: She's really smart, isn't she?
Justice is expensive.
Liberty consists of being able to make everything as harmless as possible.
zh: 自由在于能够尽可能地使一切无害。

en: Every opinion is a mixture of truth and mistakes.
zh: 每个观点都是真理和错误的混合物。

en: Life is a fatal sexually transmitted disease.
zh: 生命是一种致命的性传播疾病。

en: If two men always have the same opinion, one of them is unnecessary.
zh: 如果两个人总是持有相同的意见，那么其中一个人就是不必要的。

en: Our opinion is an idea which we have; our conviction an idea which has us.
zh: 我们的意见是我们拥有的想法；我们的信念是拥有我们的想法。

en: Tomorrow, I'm going to study at the library.
zh: 明天我要去图书馆学习。

en: Too late.
I went to the zoo yesterday.
We won the battle.
Hello? Are you still here?
I make lunch every day.
I watched TV this morning.
I read a book while eating.
I slept a little during lunch break because I was so tired.
zh: 午休的时候我睡了一会儿，因为我太累了。

en: I started learning Chinese last week.
I live near the sea so I often get to go to the beach.
zh: 我住在海边附近，所以经常可以去海滩。

en: Someday I will buy a cotton candy machine.
zh: 总有一天我会买一台棉花糖机。

en: It's practical to have a laptop.
zh: 拥有一台笔记本电脑是很实用的。

en: Your glasses fell on the floor.
How many times a day do you look at yourself in the mirror?
We went to London last year.
She doesn't want to talk about it.
I lost my inspiration.
Be patient please. It takes time.
zh: 请耐心一点。这需要时间。

en: Close the door when you leave.
zh: 你离开的时候请关上门。

en: This is such a sad story.
zh: 这真是一个悲伤的故事。

en: My little brother is watching TV.
Denying she was an anarchist, Katja maintained she wished only to make changes in our government, not to destroy it.
zh: 卡佳否认自己是无政府主义者，她坚持说她只想改变我们的政府，而不是摧毁它。

en: You met him at the university?
Aaah!! My computer is broken!
Yes, it happens from time to time.
zh: 是的，这种情况时有发生。

en: People in the world are always advocating for more freedom and equality.
zh: 世界上的人们总是在倡导更多的自由和平等。

en: He was sick of being vilified all the time by people who were jealous of his ability.
zh: 他厌倦了总是被那些嫉妒他能力的人诽谤。

en: Even people who don't believe in the Catholic church venerate the Pope as a symbolic leader.
zh: 即使是不相信天主教会的人也尊敬教皇，把他当作一个象征性的领袖。

en: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.
zh: 当飞机即将遇到气流时，飞行员要求飞机上的乘客系好安全带。

en: Jason was a taciturn individual, so it was always a real surprise when he said anything.
zh: 杰森是一个沉默寡言的人，所以当他说任何话的时候，总是让人感到非常惊讶。

en: The king was tired of his sycophants always praising him, so he sent them away.
zh: 国王厌倦了他的马屁精总是赞美他，所以他把他们赶走了。

en: Spenser would not tell anyone his surreptitious plan to get back at his friends for pranking him.
zh: 斯宾塞不会告诉任何人他偷偷摸摸的计划，要报复他的朋友们恶作剧。

en: If Spenser doesn't keep adding and translating sentences, the other contributors will surely surpass him.
zh: 如果斯宾塞不继续添加和翻译句子，其他的贡献者肯定会超过他。

en: His essay gave only a superficial analysis of the problem, so it was a real surprise to him when he got the highest grade in the class.
zh: 他的文章只是对这个问题进行了肤浅的分析，所以当他得到班里最高的成绩时，他感到非常惊讶。

en: Food and drink were served in such profusion at the wedding that the bride and groom began to wonder if they should not have invited more guests.
zh: 婚礼上提供的食物和饮料如此之多，以至于新娘和新郎开始怀疑他们是否应该邀请更多的客人。

en: The principal severely reproved the students whenever they made a mess in the hallway.
zh: 每当学生们把走廊弄脏时，校长都会严厉地斥责他们。

en: What criterion did you use when you elected this essay as the winner?
zh: 你选择这篇文章作为获胜者时使用了什么标准？

en: I like my job very much.
The murderer was convicted and sentenced to life in prison.
zh: 凶手被判有罪并被判处终身监禁。

en: It was a surprise to see all the students behaving with decorum on prom night.
zh: 在毕业舞会上看到所有的学生都举止得体，这真是一个惊喜。

en: I dreamt about you.
I have to get a new computer.
I won't lose!
I was late to school.
Classes are starting again soon.
I think I'm gonna sneeze. Give me a tissue.
zh: 我觉得我要打喷嚏了。给我张纸巾。

en: This day was just a waste of time and money.
zh: 今天真是浪费时间和金钱。

en: But you've never told me about this!
zh: 但是你从来没跟我说过这件事啊！

en: I've changed my website's layout.
zh: 我改变了我网站的布局。

en: When we are small, everything seems so big.
zh: 当我们小的时候，一切都显得那么大。

en: I have to do laundry while it's still sunny.
zh: 我得趁着还有太阳的时候洗衣服。

en: Sorry, I don't think I'm gonna be able to.
zh: 抱歉，我觉得我可能去不了了。

en: You had plenty of time.
Stop criticizing me!
Come on! Talk to me, Trang.
I'm almost done.
How many sandwiches are there left?
We could see the sunset from the window.
zh: 我们可以从窗户看到日落。

en: Did you say that I could never win?
zh: 你是说我永远赢不了吗？

en: It's all dark outside.
What happened? There's water all over the apartment.
zh: 发生了什么？公寓里到处都是水。

en: During summer breaks, I ate dinner at midnight.
zh: 在暑假期间，我会在午夜吃晚饭。

en: You will say and do things your parents said and did, even if you swore you would never do them.
zh: 你会说和做你的父母说过和做过的事情，即使你发誓你永远不会做。

en: Never try to die.
I am too old for this world.
zh: 我太老了，不适合这个世界了。

en: Life begins when you pay taxes.
zh: 人生始于你开始缴税的时候。

en: What you don't have is better than what you do have.
zh: 你没有的东西比你拥有的更好。

en: It is never too late to learn.
It's just five in the morning, but nevertheless it is light out.
zh: 现在才早上五点，但天已经亮了。

en: He told me the story of his life.
zh: 他告诉了我他的人生故事。

en: What are you talking about?
I want a piece of candy.
I knew that today would be fun.
zh: 我就知道今天会很开心。

en: When are we eating? I'm hungry!
zh: 我们什么时候吃饭？我饿了！

en: I have class tomorrow.
I can't believe it!
"Thank you." "You're welcome."
How do you pronounce "pronounce"?
Winter is my favorite season.
zh: 冬天是我最喜欢的季节。

en: It's difficult to have great ideas.
I learned a lot from you.
zh: 我从你身上学到了很多。

en: We walked a lot.
I spent twelve hours on the train.
zh: 我在火车上待了十二个小时。

en: Hold on, someone is knocking at my door.
He's sleeping like a baby.
There's a secret path on the left.
She's asking for the impossible.
zh: 她在要求不可能的事情。

en: He disappeared without a trace.
I can place the palms of my hands on the floor without bending my knees.
zh: 我可以在不弯曲膝盖的情况下将手掌放在地板上。

en: There cannot be progress without communication.
zh: 没有沟通就不会有进步。

en: Everyone would like to believe that dreams can come true.
zh: 每个人都愿意相信梦想可以成真。

en: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
zh: 让梦想成真的最好方法就是醒来。

en: The world doesn't revolve around you.
The world is full of fools.
zh: 这个世界到处都是傻瓜。

en: Are you saying my life is in danger?
zh: 你是说我的生命有危险吗？

en: Do you have any idea what my life is like?
zh: 你知道我的生活是什么样的吗？

en: This place has a mysterious atmosphere.
zh: 这个地方有一种神秘的气氛。

en: I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this matter.
zh: 我期待听到你对此事的想法。

en: So what if I am gay? Is it a crime?
